# PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleNone

**Case**

Do not apply scaling to the page when printing.

## Declaration

```swift
case pageScaleNone
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleDownToFit**: Scale large pages down to fit the paper size (smaller pages do not get scaled up).
- **PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleToFit**: Scale each page up or down to best fit the paper size.

items.description: Scale large pages down to fit the paper size (smaller pages do not get scaled up).
